Header.title: Welcome to Web 3.0
Header.paragraph: Brought to you by the LBS Blockchain Society
Header.dates: To be held on 26th, 27th and 28th April 2022

About.paragraph: The LBS Blockchain Society brings together bright minds to shape the internet of value, the web 3.0

Speakers.name: John Patrick Mullin
Speakers.title: CEO and Co-Founder of MANTRADAO & soma.finance

Speakers.name: Will Corkin
Speakers.title: Co-Founder and Council Member, MANTRADAO & soma.finance

Speakers.name: Amit Chaudhary
Speakers.title: Head of DeFi Research, Polygon Technology

Speakers.name: Moritz Seibert
Speakers.title: CIO at Exponential Age Asset Management

Team.name: Clemens Scherf
Team.title: Clemens is the founding President of the LBS Blockchain Society and a current Masters in Analytics student at London Business School. He spent the past two years before his graduate studies working as a Technology Consultant at PwC, where he worked on a large scale fintech implementation as a project manager. He has previously worked in the Hong Kong crypto industry as a Blockchain Research Analyst in 2018 and has lead the Bocconi Blockchain Association as its vice president at the Bocconi University where he obtained his BSc in Economics

Team.name: José Tomás Sabaté
Team.title: Industrial Engineer with an Information Technologies Major.Worked for seven years in Product Development and Strategy within the Financial Services industry before joining LBS MBA.Distributed Ledger Technologies Enthusiast.

Team.name: Daria Saji
Team.title: Daria is the Technology Lead at LBS Blockchain Society. She worked as a Software Developer for Citi Bank before joining London Business School

Team.name: BO Zhang
Team.title: Bo has 8 years of experience in investments, portfolio management, and research. He is currently Head of Investments at Arc St Capital and Co-Head of Research of the LBS Blockchain Society. Prior to this, he was a junior portfolio manager on the multi-asset team within JP Morgan’s Chief Investment Office in London covering equities, fixed income, currencies and commodities. This team was ranked #1 globally in Research Allocation and Investment Management by Euromoney in 2020 and 2019. Bo started his career in New York as a Client Portfolio Manager focusing on UHNW and institutional clients within JP Morgan’s Private Bank

Team.name: Raghav Aggarwal
Team.title: Aspiring Web3 Entrepreneur and Strategy Consultant. Worked for Bain & Company and Industry 4.0 leader Addverb Technologies before LBSWorking on a stealth Web3 startup in the DApps & DeFi space

Team.name: Sean Yu
Team.title: Incoming Investment Associate at Target Global Digital Assets. Ex-Wealth Manager at Cousin’s & Co. (Chinese Family Fund).Threw Investment Banking away for Crypto

Team.name: Akshat Kacheria
Team.title: Akshat is a Strategy Consultant and Software Engineer. He worked for Barclays before joining London Business School and is currently working in Strategy at Fayre Laboratories (NFT Marketplace for brands)

Team.name: Grace Guan
Team.title: Grace is currently at Fabric Ventures and an MBA student at London Business School. Before LBS, she spent 5 years at Google & YouTube across content partnerships & business operations roles, and led marketing at Commonwealth Labs (decentralized governance platform). She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania with a degree in PPE.

Team.name: Shwetabh Sameer
Team.title: Shwetabh is a Masters in Finance student at London Business School. He has over 7 years of experience in the financial and technology sector. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from BITS Pilani and a post graduate degree in Data Science from Purdue University. He is also a CFA, FRM and CIPM charter holder.

Location.paragraph: Conference events will be held at London Business School’s Sussex Place campus. If you would like further help with directions, please email us at blockchain@london.edu
